title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 58.2 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 58.2 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to reduce the number of deaths
and injuries that occur because the driver of a motor vehicle does not have a
clear and reasonably unobstructed view of the rear. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
58.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
